tool.name: Visualiser of ProtXML data

param.name: threshold
param.label: ProteinProphet probability cutoff
param.help: ProteinProphet probability cutoff i.e. if the ProteinProphet probability for a protein is lesser than this cutoff, it is discarded.

param.name: rmax
param.label: Maximum peptide ratio
param.help: The color of peptide with ratio less than or equal to rmax is greenish.

param.name: rmin
param.label: Minimum peptide ratio
param.help: The color of peptide with ratio less than or equal to rmin is redish.

param.name: zp
param.label: Positive no change zone
param.help: ?etide with ratio from 0 to zp is white.

param.name: zn
param.label: Negative no change zone
param.help: Petide with ratio from 0 to -zn is white.

tool.help:
**What it does**
Visualisation of PepXML files.
